column2: According to my current readings, the further we decend into this valley, the further the air becomes saturated with acrid gasses.
The ground is looking a bit...wet.
We shouldn't be jumping at our own shadows.
I don't recall this place on my briefing chart.
The heat is affecting my digi-scope.
I think I got swamp-ass from this heat!
So - are we agreeing the molten blood is normal or not??
We're gonna die in this fiery cesspool!
